subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort in Rajasthan was built by Raja Rai Singh?
question_hi: राजस्थान में राजा राय सिंह ने किस लोकस्त्रोत्सविक बनाया ?
explanation_en: The famous fort built by Raja Rao Jodhraj Jadeja is Kumbhalgarh. Kumbhalgarh Fort, also known as the 'Lion Fort', was built between 15th and 16th centuries and is famed for its impregnable wall.

question_en: Which famous fort in Rajasthan was built by Rao Jodha?
question_hi: राजांजन क्यांजन क्यांजन क्यांजन क्यांजन क्यांजन क्यांजन
explanation_en: Amber Fort is the famous fort built by Rao Jodha. Amber Fort, also known as the 'Haveli', was built in the 15th century.
